inclusion.criterion: confirmed influenza A(H1N1,H3N2) or influenza B virus infection by real time PCR
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: axillary temperature ≥38ºC and with at least two constitutional symptoms (headache, chill, myalgia ，or fatigue) and one respiratory symptom (cough ，sore throat,or coryza)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Illness onset had to be within 36 hours, and informed consent was obtained
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: age younger than 18 or older than 65 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients confirmed with bronchitis, pneumonia,pleural effusion and interstitial lung disease by Chest imaging (chest X-ray or CT)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Chest X-ray showed infiltrate in the middle of left lung with diameter of 1.8 cm with signs of cavitation

exclusion.criterion: Blood routine screening tests shows numeration of leukocyte 10.0×109/L or Neutrophil percentage ≥80%
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
